abstract: Moelis & Company, the boutique investment bank, said it had hired John Binnie, a former Citigroup and Morgan Stanley executive, to advise financial services clients.
snippet: Moelis & Company, the boutique investment bank, said it had hired John Binnie, a former Citigroup and Morgan Stanley executive, to advise financial services clients.
lead_paragraph: Moelis & Company, the boutique investment bank, said Monday that it has hired a former Citigroup and Morgan Stanley executive to advise financial services clients.

headline.main: Moelis Hires Veteran Financial Services Banker
